name: UploadAccountingFieldOptions
description:
Upload multiple custom accounting field options.

Use this tool to upload up to 500 new field options for a custom accounting field in a single batch. Ensure the options are sanitized and do not already exist to prevent batch rejection. For updating existing options, use the PATCH method instead.

parameters.name: field_options_batch
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'field_id' as a string and 'options' as a list of JSON objects. Each option requires a 'code', 'id', and 'value'.

field_id.description: id to uniquely identify a custom accounting field within Ramp system

code.description: Code of the custom accounting field option; e.g. 400-100.

id.description: Remote/external ID of custom accounting field option from ERP system.

options.description: A list of field options for a given custom accounting field.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

field_id.description: id to uniquely identify a custom accounting field within Ramp system

code.description: Code of the custom accounting field option; e.g. 400-100.

id.description: Remote/external ID of custom accounting field option from ERP system.

options.description: A list of field options for a given custom accounting field.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
